ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: No offense, well some offense, ok offense, just how disrespectful can you be Diablokilr? I understand this list is all ages but, I have seen 7 flame posts from
ygData.messageBody:
No offense, well some offense, ok offense, just how disrespectful can you be
Diablokilr?
I understand this list is all ages but, I have seen 7 flame posts from you
in the past two days, and personally I don't need to see some jerk flaming
people. Regardless of what the issue is about, there are better ways to talk
to people, learn some respect.
-Xandrea Hopebringer.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Diablokilr@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 2:24 PM
Subject: Re: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap


> From: Diablokilr@...
>
> The funny thing about this response was that it was meant for the other
guy
> who says my formula is incorrect.... according to my formula he had yet to
> reach the limit of his skill so kiss off Thank you.
>
>
